Interface IHasPopover

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Cursor
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Interface to be implemented by UI controls that show a Popover on click.

public interface IHasPopover : IDrawable, ITransformable

Methods

GetPopover()

Creates the Popover to display for this control. Supports returning null if the popover should only display in some cases (e.g. if the control is not disabled).

Popover? GetPopover()

Returns

Popover
